docsTags.text: - Content that goes immediately after "Tag" section and before "Properties" section.
docsTags.name: slot

props.name: for
props.docs: Component tag name (in lowercase) for which documentation is desired.

props.name: local
props.docs: If this prop is set to true the source of fetched docs for current webc-docs component must be on your local workspace. Otherwise the source is https://raw.githubusercontent.com.

events.docs:
Gets the docs source for current component.
In webcardinal.json, if there is a key named docsSource with value 'local', all webc-docs components will be configured for local docs.
Default value for docsSource is 'github'.

slots.docs: Content that goes immediately after "Tag" section and before "Properties" section.
